Uses of Class
org.bytedeco.arrow.RecordBatchFileReader

  • Packages that use RecordBatchFileReader 
    Package Description
    org.bytedeco.arrow  

    • Uses of RecordBatchFileReader in org.bytedeco.arrow

      Methods in org.bytedeco.arrow with parameters of type RecordBatchFileReader 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Status RecordBatchFileReader.Open(RandomAccessFile file, long footer_offset, RecordBatchFileReader reader)
      \brief Open a RecordBatchFileReader If the file is embedded within some larger file or memory region, you can pass the absolute memory offset to the end of the file (which contains the metadata footer).
      static Status RecordBatchFileReader.Open(RandomAccessFile file, RecordBatchFileReader reader)
      \brief Open a RecordBatchFileReader Open a file-like object that is assumed to be self-contained; i.e., the end of the file interface is the end of the Arrow file.
